it.polimi.ingsw.control

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.control.Controller
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RemoteController, RequestHandler, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class Controller
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements RemoteController, RequestHandler
    See Also:

    • Constructor Detail

      • Controller

        public Controller(Lobby lobby)
           throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Controller constructor, server side to manage both rmi and socket connections. In particular the handle methods manage the socket requests, that then call the methods already defined for the rmi methods
        Parameters:
        lobby - represents the lobby instance who has knowledge of every match in the model status
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • useToolCard1

        public boolean useToolCard1(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                            int diceChosen,
                            java.lang.String incrOrDecr,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effect of tool 1. This tool card allows the player to increment or decrement by 1 the value of a chosen dice in the reserve. The player can't increment the value of a dice with value 6 and can't decrement the value of a dice with value 1.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard1 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card (used only for singleplayer)
        diceChosen - Dice from the reserve whose value is modified.
        incrOrDecr - Choice made by the player.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

      • useToolCard2or3

        public boolean useToolCard2or3(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                               int n,
                               int startX,
                               int startY,
                               int finalX,
                               int finalY,
                               java.lang.String name,
                               boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effects of tool cards 2 and 3. Both tool cards allow the player to move a dice in his scheme card.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard2or3 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card.
        n - index of the tool card selected (it can be 2 or 3).
        startX - Row index of the chosen dice to move.
        startY - Column index of the chosen dice to move.
        finalX - Row index of the chosen dice new position.
        finalY - Column index of the chosen dice new position.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

      • useToolCard4

        public boolean useToolCard4(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                            int startX1,
                            int startY1,
                            int finalX1,
                            int finalY1,
                            int startX2,
                            int startY2,
                            int finalX2,
                            int finalY2,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effect of tool card 4. This tool card allows the player to move exactly 2 dices in his scheme card. The player has to consider all placement rules.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard4 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card.
        startX1 - Row index of the first chosen dice to move.
        startY1 - Column index of the first chosen dice to move.
        finalX1 - Row index of the first chosen dice new position.
        finalY1 - Column index of the first chosen dice new position.
        startX2 - Row index of the second chosen dice to move.
        startY2 - Column index of the second chosen dice to move.
        finalX2 - Row index of the second chosen dice new position.
        finalY2 - Column index of the second chosen dice new position.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

      • useToolCard5

        public boolean useToolCard5(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                            int diceChosen,
                            int roundChosen,
                            int diceChosenFromRound,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effect of tool card 5. This tool card allows the player to switch a dice chosen from the reserve with a dice in the round track.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard5 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card.
        diceChosen - Dice from the reserve to swap with the dice from the round track.
        roundChosen - Round slot in the round track from which the player wants to take a dice.
        diceChosenFromRound - Position index of the chosen dice in the round slot.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

      • useToolCard9

        public boolean useToolCard9(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                            int diceChosen,
                            int finalX1,
                            int finalY1,
                            java.lang.String name,
                            boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effect of tool card 9. This tool card allows the player to place one chosen dice from the reserve anywhere in his scheme card. The new dice must not have any adjacent dice and the player has to consider all constraints.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard9 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card.
        diceChosen - Dice from the reserve to place in the player's scheme card.
        finalX1 - Row index of the chosen dice new position.
        finalY1 - Column index of the chosen dice new position.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

      • useToolCard10

        public boolean useToolCard10(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                             int diceChosen,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effect of tool card 10. This tool card allows the player to put a chosen dice from the reserve upside down. It means that if the dice value is 6, after using the tool card it'll be 1, if it's 5, it'll be 2 and so on.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard10 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card.
        diceChosen - Dice from the reserve to put upside down.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

      • useToolCard11

        public boolean useToolCard11(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                             int diceChosen,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effect of tool card 11. This tool card allows the player to put a dice of the reserve back in the dices bag, and get a new dice from the bag.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard11 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card.
        diceChosen - Dice from the reserve to put back in the dices bag.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

      • useToolCard12

        public boolean useToolCard12(int diceToBeSacrificed,
                             int roundFromTrack,
                             int diceInRound,
                             int startX1,
                             int startY1,
                             int finalX1,
                             int finalY1,
                             int startX2,
                             int startY2,
                             int finalX2,
                             int finalY2,
                             java.lang.String name,
                             boolean single)
        Method used to set the parameters needed by the effect of tool card 12. This tool card allows the player to move up to 2 dices in his scheme card. These dices must have the same color of a dice in the round track. The player has to consider all placement rules.
        Specified by:
        useToolCard12 in interface RemoteController
        Parameters:
        diceToBeSacrificed - Dice from the reserve to be sacrificed in order to use this tool card.
        roundFromTrack - Round slot in round track from which the player wants to choose a dice.
        diceInRound - Index of the chosen dice from the round slot.
        startX1 - Row index of the first chosen dice to move.
        startY1 - Column index of the first chosen dice to move.
        finalX1 - Row index of the first chosen dice new position.
        finalY1 - Column index of the first chosen dice new position.
        startX2 - Row index of the second chosen dice to move.
        startY2 - Column index of the second chosen dice to move.
        finalX2 - Row index of the second chosen dice new position.
        finalY2 - Column index of the second chosen dice new position.
        name - Player's name.
        single - True in case of singleplayer
        Returns:
        True if the player hasn't used other tool cards in this turn and the card effect is applied correctly.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        a null value; the return notify from server to client is managed directly in the model

                 boolean single)
